column4: Help! xmms and OO.org segfault immediatly after startup! It worked fine yesterday and now it doesn't
Have you installed or updated anything since yesterday?
Yes, I have, I installed the nvidia driver
hmm... just the driver, i.e. I installed the kernel module, ... and I did install lynx
That doesn't sound like it should cause any problems with OOo... 0_0
Is reinstalling OO.o and xmms in synaptic easily manageable for you?
yes, no too bad. Dow big would that be...
I'll start out by reinstalling xmms and then I'll see if it helps
There should be an uninstall script with the nVidia download.
I commented it out, so I dunno :)
